ygData.subject: Delete the Happy99.exe
ygData.msgSnippet: Laura Chris Green, Ph.D.  your computer is infected. If you need help inoculating your computer, email me privately. Everyone else. Delete
ygData.messageBody:
Laura Chris Green, Ph.D." <cgreen@...> your computer is infected. If
you need help inoculating your computer, email me privately.

Everyone else. Delete the attachment called Happy99.exe that showed up on
this list. It is a virus. Laura did not know her computer was infected, so
do not blame her for this. The only thing that can be done is to not open
the file yourself and become infected.

Mailing lists really should be set up to not allow attachments to be sent
out so this type of virus would not be spread.

Tbaald
